questions.question: What are the two compounds synthesized for the first time, representing the fourth and fifth ever synthesized N-nitromethyl azoles?
Which compound exhibited a thermochromic effect, changing color when cooled down for single crystal X-ray diffraction experiments?
What method was used to estimate the detonation velocities of the energetic coordination compounds?
questions.answer: An increment method adapted for ECC by Ilyushin was used to estimate the detonation velocities.

questions.question: Which compounds were able to undergo a deflagration to detonation transition (DDT) upon thermal ignition with confinement?
questions.answer: Compounds 4 and 5 showed a DDT upon thermal ignition with confinement.

questions.question: What was the outcome of the PETN initiation tests performed with compounds 4 and 5?
questions.answer: Both compounds 4 and 5 were unable to initiate PETN in the PETN initiation tests.

questions.question: Which compounds were successfully initiated by a single laser pulse at an energy of 51 mJ?
questions.answer: Compounds 5 and 6 were successfully initiated by a single laser pulse at an energy of 51 mJ.

questions.question: How were the room temperature densities used for calculating the detonation velocity obtained?
questions.answer: The room temperature densities were obtained by recalculating the low temperature densities obtained by X-ray diffraction experiments.

questions.question: What safety precautions are recommended when synthesizing and handling the described compounds?
questions.answer: Proper security precautions such as safety glasses, face shield, earthed equipment and shoes, leather jacket, Kevlar gloves, Kevlar sleeves, and ear plugs must be worn.

questions.question: True or False: The Hirshfeld surface analysis of 1-NAMT and AzMT showed a higher portion of short-range OH and NH interactions for 1-NAMT compared to AzMT.
What was the main goal of expanding the series of N-methylene functionalized tetrazoles as ligands for energetic coordination compounds?
questions.answer: The main goal was to synthesize new N-nitromethyl azoles and apply them as ligands for energetic coordination compounds to understand the properties introduced by the N-nitromethyl moiety.
